item.title: Are there any good new servers planned?
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

so luke couldnt ddos RSCU, a server which was frequently down due to DDOS during its glory days of 25-30 players on concurrently (dont try to deny it, I played on the server actively during those times), BUT he is somehow to blame for all of the other DDOS attacks. And who is this mystery attacker that has more power than luke? Why dont you hate on him, he’s got a more powerful botnet and he’s DDOSing someone other than Luke. surely he isnt your friend if hes ddosing a competitor of RSCE

If you hate him just go ahead and do it, but if he’s here trying to put up a server where we can all pk, stake, and just play the god damn game, who cares what he did or did not DDOS…? Last time I checked this forum was not a reality check, a judgement of character, or a place of high morals. We’re here to play runescape, go cry about misleading topic titles somewhere else

Read full topic
item.source: Are there any good new servers planned?

item.title: Are there any good new servers planned?
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:22, topic:422366”][quote author=NoLives link=topic=525036.msg3827751#msg3827751 date=1322330366]
The fact that he shuts servers down is a public secret.[/quote]
Also known as speculation with zero evidence.

Server owner fails to keep their server online and functioning. Do they admit to failing or just blame someone else?

I have been through more attacks and much larger attacks than any other RSC private server owner and I’m still online. Even if I was the person inflicting the attacks on other servers (which I’m not) there’s no reason for them to close because of it. We’ve dealt with DDoS on RSCE since day one. It’s all too easy to just close up and blame it on someone else.

[quote author=NoLives link=topic=525036.msg3827751#msg3827751 date=1322330366]He couldnt take down tx’s rscu even if he tried.
And no, not rscu.[/quote]
So why isn’t it online? God forbid, did a server fail without me apparently attacking it?

As I keep saying… Post evidence or be quiet.

Servers failing is because of poor administration. KO9 tackled the problems just fine before getting bored and giving up AFTER all the problems were solved. xEnt’s BeyondRSC arguably died due to attacks but it was behind the same protection that RSCE was (which stayed online). The difference was, the software itself couldn’t handle it (not the network) and it died due to a lot of downtime. DarkQuest was ridded due to DDoS too but he had the choice of taking RSCA’s actual server which was proven to cope with DDoS attacks fine but Peeter decided against it (bad decision and poor administration). Peeter didn’t purchase any SecurePort DDoS protection so it was constantly offline at network level. RSCAftermath/RSCDevil failing wasn’t related to DDoS but instead a simple exploit that they didn’t have the knowledge to fix and in the end it collapsed.

I can’t think of any other server worth mentioning really…[/quote]Make me quiet.
DDOS me, see where that ends up.

Read full topic
item.source: Are there any good new servers planned?

item.title: Are there any good new servers planned?
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

NoLives:

The fact that he shuts servers down is a public secret.

Also known as speculation with zero evidence.

Server owner fails to keep their server online and functioning. Do they admit to failing or just blame someone else?

I have been through more attacks and much larger attacks than any other RSC private server owner and I’m still online. Even if I was the person inflicting the attacks on other servers (which I’m not) there’s no reason for them to close because of it. We’ve dealt with DDoS on RSCE since day one. It’s all too easy to just close up and blame it on someone else.

[quote=“NoLives, post:21, topic:422366”]He couldnt take down tx’s rscu even if he tried.
And no, not rscu.[/quote]
So why isn’t it online? God forbid, did a server fail without me apparently attacking it?

As I keep saying… Post evidence or be quiet.

Servers failing is because of poor administration. KO9 tackled the problems just fine before getting bored and giving up AFTER all the problems were solved. xEnt’s BeyondRSC arguably died due to attacks but it was behind the same protection that RSCE was (which stayed online). The difference was, the software itself couldn’t handle it (not the network) and it died due to a lot of downtime. DarkQuest was ridded due to DDoS too but he had the choice of taking RSCA’s actual server which was proven to cope with DDoS attacks fine but Peeter decided against it (bad decision and poor administration). Peeter didn’t purchase any SecurePort DDoS protection so it was constantly offline at network level. RSCAftermath/RSCDevil failing wasn’t related to DDoS but instead a simple exploit that they didn’t have the knowledge to fix and in the end it collapsed.

I can’t think of any other server worth mentioning really…

Read full topic
item.source: Are there any good new servers planned?

item.title: Are there any good new servers planned?
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“cyndibal, post:18, topic:422366”][quote author=NoLives link=topic=525036.msg3827545#msg3827545 date=1322310589]

[quote author=cyndibal link=topic=525036.msg3827460#msg3827460 date=1322291913]

[quote author=NoLives link=topic=525036.msg3826373#msg3826373 date=1322228034]

mopar, once it comes out and if kryptix doesnt hire sum1.

Your user name should be nolife not nolives.
[/quote]why are you up kryptix’s butt in every topic?

If it was anyone else you were flaming like you have been, I would of said the same. It is quite sad how everyone has to flame every topic he makes though.

[/quote]You do know why I’m flaming him though right?

just shut up and let him do what he needs to do, you realize he’s most likely our only chance at ever having a good server to play on ever again right? who cares if he makes a few g’s off of it, fuck, who cares if he makes a million off of it? as long as you get to play the game you love, the game that we’re all here for, you shouldnt be flaming him. go practice MMA if you have so much anger to unleash.
[/quote]I couldn’t care less if he ONLY made money off his server and helped develop rsc.
BUT,
he not only makes money off his server, he shuts down other servers and thus STOPS rsc from developing.

I personally have yet to see proof of him shutting down other servers. And even if he was, who has really put up a server with potential to actually rival him in the past 6 months? Tx’s RSCU? ROFL[/quote]The fact that he shuts servers down is a public secret.
He couldnt take down tx’s rscu even if he tried.
And no, not rscu.
Other servers with custom content.

Read full topic
